Compounds
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{wp|lang=ja|五蘊}} {{wp|Skandha}}
{{ja-kanjitab|うん|yomi=o}} From {{der|ja|ltc|sort=うん|-}} {{ltc-l|蘊}}. The Buddhist sense is a translation of {{der|ja|sa|sort=うん|स्कन्ध||[[collection]], [[grouping]], [[heap]]}}{{R:Daijisen}}{{R:Daijirin}} or {{der|ja|pi|sort=うん|khandha||[[collection]], [[heap]]}}. See entry at {{m|ja|五蘊|tr=goun}}.

subSections.title: Noun
